content: at the beginning of the body you need to start it with a double magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet stitches 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch from last round 12 single_crochet round 3 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 6 times 18 single_crochet round 4 1 single_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 24 single_crochet round 5 1 single_crochet in next 3 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 30 single_crochet round 6 1 single_crochet in next 4 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 36 single_crochet round 7 1 single_crochet in next 5 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 42 single_crochet round 8 1 single_crochet in next 6 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 48 single_crochet round 9 1 single_crochet in next 7 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 54 single_crochet round 10 54 single_crochet round 11 54 single_crochet 2 round 12 54 single_crochet round 13 54 single_crochet round 14 54 single_crochet round 15 54 single_crochet round 16 54 single_crochet round 17 54 single_crochet round 18 7 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 48 single_crochet change color to light blue yarn round 19 48 single_crochet crochet blo only this round round 20 48 single_crochet round 21 48 single_crochet round 22 6 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 42 single_crochet round 23 42 single_crochet place the eye patch with the eyelet between 14 and 15 do not secure it yet pin the left eye patch also on the owl s head to see if both eyes are in the right place see picture the upper edge of the patch should be on tour 9/10 and the bottom of the patch should be on tour 18/19 to be sure fill the head temporarily to see how it is with eyes on it if you are sure of the correct position of the eyelet then secure it with the washer 3 round 24 42 single_crochet round 25 42 single_crochet round 26 42 single_crochet round 27 42 single_crochet round 28 5 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 36 single_crochet round 29 36 single_crochet round 30 4 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 30 single_crochet round 31 30 single_crochet round 32 30 single_crochet fill with poly fill round 33 3 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 24 single_crochet round 34 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 18 single_crochet round 35 1 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 6 times 12 single_crochet stuff the head a little bit more make a knot cut the yarn with scissors but leave a long enough tail thread the yarn end through a yarn needle and gather the final stitches by weaving the needle through the front loop of each
